mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, boardlist.* FROM ( SELECT I.item_idx, I.category_idx, I.expert_idx, I.item_name, I.item_content, I.price, I.item_date, P.itemfile_name FROM item I JOIN photo P ON I.item_idx = P.item_idx LEFT JOIN expert E ON I.expert_idx = E.expert_idx WHERE I.expert_idx = #{expertIdx} AND I.item_status = 1 ORDER BY I.item_date ) boardlist ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
